Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class STLUtility::Array< T >

A simple vector container that does not destroy the data.

Think of it as a std::vector but it does not delete the data. Example usage

See also:
GenericMap where it uses the container as helper to point to a small array within an even larger array. Or in other words; a subset array.
